tool_description: Validate Well-known text (WKT) of LineString and Polygon. This tool checks the validity of WKT format for polylines and polygons according to OGC standards.

api_list.name: Validate Polygon
api_list.description: Validates a set of Polygon's coordinates (longitude/latitude) in WKT format against OGC standards. Returns FALSE if there are intersections or if the interior linear rings are counterclockwise and the exterior linear ring is clockwise.

api_list.name: Validate LineString
api_list.description: Validates a set of LineString's coordinates (longitude/latitude) in WKT format against OGC standards. Returns FALSE if there are intersections.
